definition: brazen boldness coupled with impudent assurance and insolence
examples: had the gall to think that he could replace her

definition: bile, bile obtained from an animal and used in the arts or medicine
to fret and wear away by friction : chafe
examples: the loose saddle galled the horse's back
the galling of a metal bearing

definition: to become sore or worn by rubbing
an abnormal outgrowth of plant tissue usually due to insect or mite parasites or fungi and sometimes forming an important source of tannin â€” see gall wasp illustration
a skin sore caused by chronic irritation
a cause or state of exasperation
